name: diverticulitis
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a condition in which a diverticulum (= a small pocket) that has formed in the bowels, especially in the colon (= the lower and larger part of the bowels), becomes sore or infected, causing pain and often problems with digesting food: A low-fibre diet may be a cause of diverticulitis.
More examplesFewer examplesDiverticulitis occurs when diverticula, which are bulging pouches that form in the gut's lining, develop an infection or inflammation.She underwent surgery for acute diverticulitis.Probiotics and a high-fibre diet often help treat diverticulitis. Johnson was on a liquid diet, recovering from a bout of diverticulitis.
